DOC.brief_summary: The main aim is to evaluate the long-term safety and bone healing in the operated area and to compare bioactive glass granules with autogenous bone as a filler material.
DOC.brief_title: Bioactive Glass as Bone Graft Substitute in Operative Treatment of Bone - a 10 Years Follow-up Study
DOC.criteria: Written informed consent obtained; Participation of previous clinical investigation with bioactive glass The subject is unlikely to adhere to study procedures Concurrent disease or condition that in the opinion of the investigator is contraindicating participation Simultaneous participation in another medical device or investigational drug trial
